thread.title: Geordie Shore's Scotty T in charitable act as he pays for 'skint' fan's entire night out
thread.title_full: Geordie Shore's Scotty T in charitable act as he pays for 'skint' fan's entire night out

title: Geordie Shore's Scotty T in charitable act as he pays for 'skint' fan's entire night out
text:
INSTAGRAM GEORDIE SHORE STAR: Scotty T has made a fan's day 
The reality stars are constantly going on wild nights out, living it up in some the best clubs in the country. 
And Scotty T is often making public appearances meeting his fans up and down the UK. 
However, lots of Geordie Shore's viewers are young students who aren't always able to pay the fees to get into the clubs and meet their favourite stars. The hottest ever Geordie Shore selfies Thursday, 16th February 2017 The sexiest ever selfies from the cast of the much loved MTV show 'Geordie Shore' 1 / 35 SHOCKED FAN: Sophie Heffer couldn't believe her luck 
twitter CHARITABLE ACT: Scotty T offered to pay for a fan's night in Norwich 
Today an avid Scotty fan was left gutted when she realised she couldn't afford a night out to cross paths with the Celebrity Big Brother winner. 
They wrote on Twitter: "When @ScottGShore is in Norwich on Friday, but you can't go out because you're so skint." 
Not wanting his devoted follower to miss out, Scotty surprisingly responded to the tweet and offered to pay for the girl's night out. CBB Winners through the years Thursday, 28th July 2016 With Celebrity Big Brother starting we remember all the past winners of the contest 1 / 18 Past winners form Celebrity Big Brother 
TWITTER BIG NIGHT: Sophie can't wait for the night out “It is so wonderful, considering I'm such a huge fan of Geordie Shore and I missed the last time he came to Norwich” Sophie Heffer 
He said to his follower, Sophie Heffer: "I will pay for you to come.. How much do you need x." 
The shocked fan casually replied: "Drop us a DM." 
So northern lad Scott told his loyal fan to email his manager, who would arrange the entire evening for her. 
The shocked follower was clearly elated and said: "Cheers man!!! Absolute legend x." 
INSTAGRAM REALITY LEGEND: Scotty didn't want his fan to miss out 
She later posted to Twitter: "When Scott becomes your bae and pays for your night out." 
Sophie told Daily Star Online: "It is so wonderful, considering I'm such a huge fan of Geordie Shore and I missed the last time he came to Norwich for once again being skint. 
"He's now offered to pay, it's amazing!" Related articles
